content.en: Reinforcement Learning: Researchers have been exploring various aspects of reinforcement learning algorithms. They have investigated the formulation and analysis methods for these algorithms, as well as their applications in solving different types of decision problems. The algorithms have been attributed agency in terms of their ability to approximate value functions, improve robusticity, attack the curse of dimensionality, and achieve adaptive control. Additionally, researchers have developed novel methods such as dynamic policy programming and differential/integral policy iterations to estimate optimal policies in continuous-time and space problems.
content.da: Forstærkningslæring: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige aspekter af forstærkningslæringsalgoritmer. De har undersøgt formulering og analysemetoder for disse algoritmer samt deres anvendelser i løsning af forskellige typer beslutningsproblemer. Algoritmerne er blevet tillagt evner med hensyn til deres evne til at tilnærme værdifunktioner, forbedre robusthed, bekæmpe dimensionalitetens forbandelse og opnå adaptiv kontrol. Derudover har forskere udviklet nye metoder såsom dynamisk politikprogrammering og differential/integral politikiterationer til at estimere optimale politikker i kontinuert tid og rum.
